messageBody:
I am developing a project with Netbeans. I am using spring and
hibernate in the project.

I want to test my procejt but i get an error abbout classpath. The
test looks for a file but can not find it. The file is
hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd named file. It places in
myproject/build/classes directory. But it searches th file in
/myproject directory. While the test cannot find the .dtd file, it
can find the other files which places in the same directory with .dtd
file.
The exact error:Caused by: org.dom4j.DocumentException:
E:\Bussiness\Projects\myproject\hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd (The system
cannot find the file specified) Nested exception:
E:\Bussiness\Projects\myproject\hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd (The system
cannot find the file specified)
at org.dom4j.io.SAXReader.read(SAXReader.java:484)



How can i solve this problem?


PS: I solved the problem by copying "hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd" in
myproject folder . But this not the solution i want. There should be
another solution.
